revisions.rev:
[[File:Sheiner 001.png|thumb|Sheiner in the [[The Odd Couple (film)|The Odd Couple]] in 1968]]
'''David Sheiner''' (born January 13, 1928 in [[New York City]]) is an American film and television actor.
==Biography== He was born in January 13, 1928 in [[New York City]].
He got attention from several of his featured roles, including [[The Odd Couple (film)|The Odd Couple]] as Roy and [[The Greatest Story Ever Told]] as James the Elder. Additionally, he has a stretch of experience in many television roles, including [[The Man from U.N.C.L.E.]], S.W.A.T, [[Mission: Impossible (TV series)|Mission: Impossible]], [[Blind Ambition (TV mini-series)|Blind Ambition]], and [[The Fugitive (TV series)|The Fugitive]].
David retired from acting in 1988.
